text: Tapa'ile uniharusita tyasa bastiko visayama sodhnus, jo sagaratatma avasthita thiyo ra jaba tiniharule ‘‘satako’’ barema sima ullaghanna gardathe, jaba unaka satako dina tinaka machaharu khullarupama tiniharu samaksa paniko satahamathi a'unthe, ra jaba unako satako dina humdainathyo taba tiniharu unako samunne a'umdainathe. Yasaprakara hamile unala'i avajnakari bha'eko karanale pariksama pardathyaum
